title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Constructivist-Based Language Learning Design in Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently design and execute language practice projects based on constructivist methodologies in virtual environments
Learners can collaboratively co-create language learning content with peer learners using digital collaboration tools
Learners can perform asynchronous interactions while adhering to netiquette in smartphone-based LMS environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
